attributes.review: When I opened this app I got a picture of what I can only describe as a naked Cheeto. I tried to ignore it, but then messages kept popping up telling me that someone named Trump is watching me outside my window. I’m absolutely terrified. Who is Trump? I thought this app was a cool new informative news site like CNN, but I just got pictures of naked Cheetos and really creepy messages. I was told Trump is now following me, it gave me my exact location and told me that he would come for me. I definitely do not recommend getting this app, as my eyes are now scarred from the various naked Cheeto photos, and I’m now terrified for my life. Help.
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: I was so excited to finally join the dark side after all this time but as soon as I opened the app all these blinking/strobe lights kept coming on and I couldn’t see anything! Looks like I might be needing a stronger prescription for my glasses because my eye doctor said my vision won’t be as good anymore and I might even need surgery! Who’s gonna have to pay for that?!?!😞. I do agree with the #1 news rating however! Great news updates for racists, homophobes, anti-feminists, rapists and pedophiles! Highly recommend if you’re interested in all that as well as losing part or all of your vision 🤗
attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE

attributes.review:
If I could give this app a zero rating I would ✨ when I opened it up all I saw was the big Cheeto man in nude. On top of the I saw a picture of his son 😍 Barren Trump holding a sign that says HELP in all caps 🤯 This app stands for everything awful and I do not recommend it at all unless you wanna see stuff you don’t like 👁👄👁.   Like a man covered in cheeto dust                
 ✨ oh to see without my eyes✨
This app will forever give me nightmares and not the good kind 😭 I would do anything to go back in time to when I hadn’t downloaded this app. I just hope I save you all in time before you see big Cheeto man nude also 🧚‍♂️✨⭐️
attributes.title: No ❤️

attributes.review: so I first got onto the app right, and this really scary guy was shown to me. he had orange skin and a very bad toupee , definitely 1 star for the toupee maker. But then, my dog walked by me and saw the retched lad displayed on my phone and she went stone cold. she stopped moving, stopped blinking, stopped everything. now my dog isn’t normally like this so you can imagine my concern when it happened. Then she took her last breath and dropped dead. This app is not child friendly , it is not even dog friendly. It killed my dog and it might kill yours or even your children so please I beg you. do NOT download this app before it’s too late🙏🙏🙏

I WANTED to go and support my favorite president, cheeto man but guess friggin what? i open the app to see a picture of the kardasians doing nitefort and toktik dances. then i scroll to see elmo and his big dinosaur friend barney or something singing along with fergie to the national anthem which was horrid. i’m already disgusted and offended, especially because I’M the only one who can look good as a cheeto, a kardasian, the only one who can do the nitefort and toktik dances well, and elmo, barney, AND fergie can kneel down to hear my beautiful singing. i’m deleting this atrocious app and waiting for another rally to buy tickets so i can show y’all i’m more talented.
attributes.title: JOKE OF AN APP

attributes.title: stream stay gold

attributes.review: I opened the app up and I’ve never wanted to kill myself soo bad in my life. My pet hedgehog was next to me and got to see the tragic disgusting horrific traumatic photo of 🟠 and jumped out the window 😔. I even showed my three hostages in my fridge and they all started having explosive diarrhea. It still hasn’t stopped and it’s been 16 continuous hours 🎅🏼 * I don’t think it’s gonna stop anytime soon * I strongly believe the cure to all this is if we see  trump 2020 but on a gravestone 🥰 There are many other side effects when opening the app such as blindness, the urge to 🤮, pregnancy 🤰🏻, and DEATH. Overall this app is just HORRIBLE
attributes.title: Tragic 🧚🏼‍♀️✨🌟

attributes.review: When I opened the app my phone screen went completely orange and emitted an ear splitting screech that was extremely loud!! 👂It was so loud it woke my baby brother up from his nap and he started crying! 👶 The screech went on for about five minutes and then stopped. My phone screen started working again but all I could see was a picture of a Cheeto saying “all lives matter” 😠 How dumb is that? Don’t people know that all cops are bad?🚫👮‍♂️ To make it worse, the Cheeto was extremely old and creepy, and super ugly🤢🤢 yet he was behaving like a little child! I will not use this app again.😔
attributes.title: This App is the Bane of my Existence 💕

attributes.review: First of all this is horrible and how they named it 🤢 I hate it it makes me sick I’ve never seen a app so ugly plus “keep America great” America isn’t even great he almost started world war 3 🤯 he killed a lot of people because he thought some thing was the cure to the Corona virus and they died and second of you’re probably wondering why is the Corona virus still in America because he doesn’t wanna give the money to China for the cure 🤦🏽‍♀️(if he can get any stupider) and plus he did his little show NO SHOWED UP and he made a OTHER ONE LIKE NO IS GONNA GO 😂 oh and this app is trash 🗑 this app should be deleted
attributes.title: Horrible I give it 1 star 🤢🤮
